origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'RealEstateAPI.get_market_analysis', 'description': 'This function provides a real estate market analysis report based on the report type and region.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'reportType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of report, e.g., latest, historical.'}, {'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The region for which the report is requested, e.g., national, state, city.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'The real estate market analysis report.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 RealEstateAPI.get_market_analysis, 它的参数输入如下: 'reportType'是'latest', 'region'是'national'.
